item.title: How to get inspired?
item.description:
How to get inspired?

Go outside. Breath some fresh air. Change your point of view. Leave your comfort zone. Do things differently. Talk to people. Go running. Or walking.

item.title: Saatchi Art Artist: Konrad Pitala; Color 2012 Photography "*tri*angle* #1"
item.description:
Saatchi Art Artist: Konrad Pitala; Color 2012 Photography "*tri*angle* #1"

Part of a triptych. Photographic artwork depicting the power of light, printed on metallic base paper (Epson HDR archival grade), mounted on a foam. Created by exposing the film in a light-leaking camera (Lomography Diana F+), then scanned in hi resolution & digitally added graphic motive - triangles.

item.title: From a Kitchen's Side (1 of 8) by Konrad Pitala
item.description:
From a Kitchen's Side (1 of 8) by Konrad Pitala

This is a part of exhibition titled 'From a Kitchen's Side', which took place in 2006, at 'Å»ak' Gallery in Gdansk (Poland). From conceptual side, it's all about our everyday life, cooking tools we use, and almost never think about them in other way.
